mapper.update: update t_product_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_mode = #{productMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_no, user_id, product_mode, product_id, staff_id, channel_id from t_product_order

SELECT COUNT(0) devAmount, sum(order_amount) totalTurnover, sum(order_amount)/30 dayTurnover FROM t_product_order WHERE product_id in ( SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM t_product_info WHERE province_code = ( SELECT area_id FROM t_area_info WHERE area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) and order_date like #{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

select i.product_name, o.month, o.sum, o.last_month, o.last_sum from t_product_info i, ( select a.product_id, month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) as month,sum(convert(order_amount, decimal(10,2))) as sum, last_month, last_sum from t_product_order a, ( select month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) as last_month, product_id, sum(convert(order_amount, decimal(10,2))) as last_sum from t_product_order where month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d')) = month(date_sub(now(), interval 1 month )) group by product_id ) b where month(str_to_date(order_date, '%Y%m%d'))=month(now()) and a.product_id = b.product_id group by product_id ) o where i.product_id = o.product_id
